name: honeybee-web
description: Pure JS version of the Honeybee section of Honeybee-Hive

scripts.forge: (cd node_modules/node-forge && npm install && npm run bundle && cp js/forge.bundle.js ../../build/out)
scripts.build: mkdir -p ./build/out && npm run forge && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify build/main.js > build/out/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]

author: Kurimizumi
